name: Summer Story
description:
Summer Story is a co-op adventure exploration game for up to 4 players, set on a beautiful tropical island. 

Discover a heartwarming journey of friendship as you explore the island, catch fish, help out villagers, and go camping.

Key Features

  • Multiplayer player dialogue with unique conversations to every character.
  • Multiple styles of cooperative fishing minigames. 
  • Unique, pixelated, retro style that matches an 80’s timeline.
  • Relaxing summer theme with sunsets, campfires, and childhood adventures.

Developed by Daria Lezucha and Aaron Hamilton.

Controls for Keyboard:

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Interact - Z
  • Run - X
  • Inventory - C
  • Menu/Start - V
  • Cycle Inventory/Menu - A/D
